title: Waterfront Land & House, Koggala
details: One acre of elevated lake side land with exquisite views over the Koggala lagoon. Ideally located on the North side of the Lake facing the sunset and just fifteen minutes drive from beautiful beaches of Koggala and Thalpe. Access to the Colombo-Matara expressway is also just fifteen minutes away and Galle fort is approximaitely 20minutes away. The property is boasts a wealth of mature fruit trees and coconut palms and the little house situated on the land could be easily renovated into a comfortable family home.
